com.brightcove.plugin.onceux

Class SeekManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.plugin.onceux.SeekManager

  • public class SeekManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide a class to manage the media player's playhead position during seeking as the frame of reference switches between ads and content within the dynamic stitched video. Diagrammatcially we have: |<(0)---------------- absolute frame of reference ----------------(L)>| |---------------------------------------------------------------------| |<-- Segment-0 -->|...|<---- Segment-i ---->|...|<---- Segment-N ---->| where Segment-i represents the i'th segment, either ad or content. This class will map a given segment index and relative position to an absolute position (from 0 to L-1, where L is the length of the dynamic stitched video). It does so by maintaining a data structure (SparseArray) that associates a segment index, the start absolute playhead position for that segment and a segment desriptor, a POJO that describes the segment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SeekManager(BrightcoveVideoView videoView)
      Build the position mapper using help from a given videoView object.

      • SeekManager

        public SeekManager(BrightcoveVideoView videoView)
        Build the position mapper using help from a given videoView object.
        Parameters:
        videoView - The given event emitter which is used to setup event handlers to manage the current (segement) frame of reference and to initialize at the start of a video.
